page.title: 02HOUSING.
page.content: The area is almost completly filled with 20th century city council rented houses. The only exception is on Padholm Road. Here there were 154 late 19th/20th cen.small villa type houses During the 1920's the Eastfield estate was built to rehouse people from the demolished housing nearer the Cathedral.All the 600 counted houses were semi-detached or linked housing.The Park Lane area were older and often poorly kept. Here many houses had been improved in 1984, with new roof,double glazing and insulation.Along Reeves Wau the houses were about 10 years younger and better kept.At least 25 had been privately bought over the last 2 years.There was some1960/70 infilling with modern council flats.
